Submodules

pywaspgen.modem.digital.digital module

class pywaspgen.modem.digital.digital.DIGITAL(sig_type)[source]

Bases: MODEM

Digital modem base class.

gen_symbols(num_symbols)[source]

Generates a random set of symbols from the digital modem’s symbol table.

Parameters:

num_symbols (int) – The number of random data symbols to generate.

Returns:

A numpy array, of size defined by num_symbols, of random data symbols chosen uniformly from the digital modem’s data symbol table.

Return type:

float complex

get_symbols(samples)[source]

Demodulates a modulated data sample stream.

Parameters:

samples (float complex) – The modulated data symbols to be demodulated.

Returns:

A numpy array of demodulated data symbols calculated from samples.

Return type:

float complex

set_sps(sps)[source]

Sets the samples per symbol of the digital modem.

Parameters:

sps (float) – The samples per symbol to be used by the digital modem for upsampling the data symbols.

symbol_table_create()[source]

Creates the modem’s IQ data symbol table of the type specified by DIGITAL.sig_type.
